Name: Page Blocks Classification
Abstract: The problem consists of classifying all the blocks of the page layout of a document that has been detected by a segmentation process.
RelevantInfo: The 5473 examples comes from 54 distinct documents. Each observation concerns one block. All attributes are numeric. Data are in a format readable by C4.5.
